column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Are you sure you 're ready for this ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Yes .
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=I need to do this alone .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I figured you would show up sooner or later .
#Text=So ... you must really be in trouble if you came all the way down here to see me .
#Text=" Korra says : " I came here to look you in the eye and tell you that you have no power over me .
#Text=I will no longer be scared of you .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I guess it did n't work .
#Text=You still seem scared .
#Text=" Korra says : " This was a mistake .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I know why you 're here .
#Text=" Korra says : " You do n't know anything about me !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You ca n't go into the Spirit World .
#Text=I spend most of my time in the Spirit World and it 's well known that the Avatar 's spirit has n't been there for a few years .
#Text=" Korra says : " You can meditate into the Spirit World from here ?
#Text=Does n't feel very spiritually charged .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " This is your problem .
#Text=Republic City is flowing with spiritual energy and you ca n't even tap into it .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , my problem is you !
#Text=You poisoned me !
#Text=You 've ruined me !
#Text=People used to think I was unstoppable , but now they do n't think I 'm capable of anything !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Blaming me is a crutch to make you feel better , but it 's not helping you recover .
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought seeing you face - to - face would put an end to all of this .
#Text=But maybe it 's time I realize I 'll never be the same .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Neither of us are the same as before .
#Text=I learned to fly , but now I 'm bound in chains .
#Text=You have all the power in the world and the freedom to use it , but you choose to hold yourself down .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not holding myself down , but my powers have limits !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You 're wrong .
#Text=That poison should 've killed you , but you were able to fight it off .
#Text=You think your power has limits ; I say , it 's limitless .
#Text=" Korra says : " Whatever .
#Text=Before , you were always talking about chaos and freedom .
#Text=Then you took out the Earth Queen and created the worst dictator the Earth Kingdom has ever seen .
#Text=Thanks for that !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I 've heard rumors about her , but I did n't know she achieved so much power .
#Text=She needs to be stopped .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I ca n't stop her unless I get over this block .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I think I can help .
#Text=Let me lead you into the Spirit World .
#Text=" Korra says : " No way .
#Text=I ca n't trust you .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Maybe not .
#Text=But if you had any other options , you would n't be here now , would you ?
#Text=We may have been enemies once , but for now , our interests align .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 've come this far .
#Text=What have I got to lose ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Focus on the sound of my voice and clear your mind .
#Text=Let it play out .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You can .
#Text=Accept what happened to you .
#Text=Do n't fear what might have been .
#Text=" Korra says : " I have no control !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Do n't be afraid .
#Text=Hold on !
#Text=" Korra says : " I made it ... and you led me here .
#Text=Do you know where Jinora and the others are ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " No , but you do .
#Text=" Korra says : " Raava , I missed you .
#Text=Where have you been ?
#Text=" Raava says : " I have always been inside of you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Can you help me find Jinora ?
#Text=How do I release their spirits ?
#Text=" Raava says : " You must bend the energy within .
#Text=" Korra says : " But I 'm powerless in the Spirit World .
#Text=" Raava says : " No .
#Text=You 're most powerful here .
#Text=In the Spirit World , you 're connected to all the spiritual energy .
#Text=" Ryu says : " Ugh ... I feel all spirity .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Dad !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm so glad you 're safe .
#Text=What happened ?
#Text=How did you get out ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Korra saved us .
#Text="
